summary:
If you\'re like me, you enjoy breaking into houses and shops, & steal everything in sight. Unfortunately, that everything is fairly limited.
Not with this mod, however.
You\'ll find the practical to be stolen - spools of thread, a washbasin, childrens toys, and the impractical, purely for vanity items such as action figurines & dragon claws that
descriptionHtml:
Back to working on this. Had some computer issues, so had to reinstall game & files. Anyway, in the version l\'m working on now, I\'ve made some experimental changes. Arcadia\'s Cauldron has a table with failed & spoiled potions, & a few other things like that. Her loft has also had a small layout change. Finetuning the lighting in belethor\'s loft. 

Items added

Treasures:
Ebony Raven Statue
Draugr Figurine
Brown Bear Figurine
Morrowind Relics (not the artifacts.) (values may change, as well as placement)



Non-Treasures:
Building blocks (With letters, dova characters, or numbers.)
Crystal Balls
Hour Glasses
Couple ingredients & soul gems (where appropriate)
Tops (The spinning toy)
Teddy Bears
Planters (hopefully with appropriate weights & values. will adjust as necessary.)
Bits of charcoal, paper for people to write all these books and notes
Food & Drink 
Wash Basins, Soap & Scrub Brushes
Watering Cans
Spools of Thread
Extra bow & arrows 
Weapon Racks with weapons (low quality/level.)
Basket of dead bugs - can you find who\'s been catching dragonflies, & his stash of bird eggs?


Static Items added:
Rocking Horse
Paintings 
\"Drawings\"?
Mead Barrels
Harvestable static planters
Couple tables
Clothes Lines
Firewood Piles
Misc Furniture
A bee hive - have you ever noticed all those holes in the walls etc??  Look for it. :p
Spinning Wheel, barrel of wool and a stool
Cob Webs with bugs
Shield Racks (empty.)

Vanilla Layout Changes (rare)
Sevario Pelagia\'s house - added a ladder to the loft. think of it like extra storage he mostly ignores. Navmesh shouldn\'t give any trouble, haven\'t tested it w/ followers yet but it should be fine. 

Since I finally have something to show, I\'m going to go ahead and list the resources I used, and where I got them.
author: Slainia
